member.name: M:Enterprise.Scrutor.ScrutorRegistrar.RegisterUsingScrutorAttributes(Scrutor.IImplementationTypeSelector,Scrutor.RegistrationStrategy)
member.summary: This auto wires anything that has the [ServiceDescriptor] attribute. There is a bit of a code smell to this because the classes have awareness of how they should be injected. It also requires projects to have a reference to the Scrutor library because the attribute is defined there.

member.name: M:Enterprise.Scrutor.ScrutorRegistrar.RegisterUsingCustomAttributes(Scrutor.IImplementationTypeSelector,Scrutor.RegistrationStrategy)
member.summary: These still have a bit of a code smell, but do NOT require a dependency on Scrutor.
